title: Cylinder Volume Calculator (Full & Horizontal Tank) | L, m³, ft³, gallons

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Segment area: \( A = r^2 \cos^{-1}\left(\frac{r - h}{r}\right) - (r - h)\sqrt{2rh - h^2} \) Volume: \( V = A \times L \)
